mapper.select: SELECT R.*, MO.MO_TITLE, MO.MO_CATEGORY, MO.MO_IDX, M.M_GENDER, M.M_NICKNAME FROM REVIEW R, MOIM MO, MEMBER M WHERE R.RV_DEL_YN(+) = 'N' AND R.MO_IDX = MO.MO_IDX AND M.M_IDX = R.M_IDX AND R.RV_IDX = #{RV_IDX}

SELECT R.*, MO.MO_TITLE, MO.MO_CATEGORY, M.M_GENDER, M.M_NICKNAME, F.* FROM REVIEW R, FILE_T F, MOIM MO, MEMBER M WHERE F.F_TABLE(+) = 'R' AND F.F_MAIN_YN(+) = 'N' AND F.F_ARTICLE(+) = R.RV_IDX AND F.F_DEL_YN(+) = 'N' AND R.RV_DEL_YN(+) = 'N' AND R.MO_IDX = MO.MO_IDX AND M.M_IDX = R.M_IDX AND MO.MO_CATEGORY = #{MO_CATEGORY} ORDER BY F.F_REG_DATE DESC
SELECT F_MAIN_YN, F_SVNAME, F_IDX, F_OGNAME, F_SIZE, F_TABLE FROM FILE_T WHERE F_DEL_YN = 'N' AND F_ARTICLE = #{RV_IDX}

SELECT COUNT(*) RVC, TO_CHAR(AVG(RV_STAR), 'FM9.0') AVGSP FROM ( SELECT R.*, NVL(F.F_SVNAME, 0) AS RF_SVNAME, MO.MO_TITLE, M.* FROM REVIEW R, FILE_T F, MOIM MO, MEMBER M WHERE F.F_TABLE(+) = 'R' AND F.F_MAIN_YN(+) = 'Y' AND F.F_ARTICLE(+) = R.RV_IDX AND F.F_DEL_YN(+) = 'N' AND R.RV_DEL_YN(+) = 'N' AND R.MO_IDX = MO.MO_IDX AND M.M_IDX = R.M_IDX AND MO.MO_CATEGORY = #{MO_CATEGORY} ORDER BY F.F_REG_DATE DESC ) REVIEW
SELECT COUNT(Z.Z_ARTICLE) AS RZ_COUNT FROM ZZIM Z, REVIEW R WHERE Z.Z_TABLE = 'R' AND Z.Z_ARTICLE = R.RV_IDX AND R.RV_IDX = #{RV_IDX} AND RV_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(Z_IDX) AS RZ_CHECK FROM ZZIM Z, REVIEW R, MEMBER M WHERE Z.M_IDX = M.M_IDX AND R.RV_IDX = Z.Z_ARTICLE AND Z.Z_TABLE = 'R' AND R.RV_IDX = #{RV_IDX} AND M.M_IDX = #{M_IDX} AND RV_DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT RV_IDX.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REVIEW ( RV_IDX, M_IDX, MO_IDX, RV_CONTENT, RV_REGDATE, RV_TITLE, RV_DEL_YN, RV_STAR ) VALUES ( #{RV_IDX}, #{M_IDX}, #{MO_IDX}, #{RV_CONTENT}, sysdate, #{RV_TITLE}, 'N', #{RV_STAR} )

INSERT INTO FILE_T ( F_IDX, F_TABLE, F_ARTICLE, F_OGNAME, F_SVNAME, F_SIZE, F_MAIN_YN, F_DEL_YN, F_REG_DATE ) VALUES ( F_IDX.NEXTVAL, 'R', #{F_ARTICLE}, #{F_OGNAME}, #{F_SVNAME}, #{F_SIZE}, 'N', 'N', sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET RV_STAR = #{RV_STAR}, RV_TITLE = #{RV_TITLE}, RV_CONTENT = #{RV_CONTENT}, RV_REGDATE = sysdate WHERE RV_IDX = #{RV_IDX} AND M_IDX = #{M_IDX} AND MO_IDX = #{MO_IDX} AND RV_DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE FILE_T SET F_DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE F_IDX = #{F_IDX}
UPDATE FILE_T SET F_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE F_ARTICLE = #{RV_IDX} AND F_TABLE = 'R'
UPDATE REVIEW SET RV_DEL_YN = 'Y', RV_REGDATE = sysdate WHERE RV_IDX = #{RV_IDX} AND M_IDX = #{M_IDX} AND MO_IDX = #{MO_IDX} AND RV_DEL_YN = 'N'
